column4: it works fine on my desktop, sorry if this sounds condescending, but are you holding the mouse button down while dragging?
yes i am. are you dragging from the wochspace switcher though ?
workspace*
oh i thought you were talking about things on the desktop. right click the desktop switcher, is it locked?
oh, you wanted to drag an application from one workspace to another, using the desktop, right? that works fine for me, too
the "lock to panel" doesnt seem to make a difference for me
you can always just rightclick the title bar and select "move to workspace...."
I can drag just fine on the workspace, but not within the workspace switcher
and the hover tooltip just says "click to start dragging" lol
well i can drag things from one workspace to another using the workspace switcher
Hmmm.. wonder why i cant
in fact I have two computers with ubuntu installed and neither one can
are they of the same make/model/brand, and both of the same ubuntu version? It could be because i'm still on 10.04
both on 10.4.1
what computers are they?
different hardware, but both 64bit
i've got 32-bit
ok, thanks.. i'll see if google can help :/
anyone with 64-bit ubuntu 10.04 wanna drag an app from one workspace to another using the workspace switcher real quick?

http://paste.ubuntu.com/554142/ is in my fstab, and i imported ssh keys to my other computer according to this: http://pkeck.myweb.uga.edu/ssh/ but it still won't mount my network drive on boot, can anyone help?
it looks like a problem with Compiz. See http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?p=8880489
well, seeing as i don't have compiz on, that'd make sense
